settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Beard and Bones Dispatches orders 6 days a week.

To get same day delivery, Order before 3pm on Monday to Friday or before 11am on Saturday.

International orders may be subject to import tax, we do not control these.

All orders are tracked using Royal Mail or DPD.

settings.title: DISCOVER YOUR SIGNATURE SCENT!
settings.text:
With so many captivating aromas to choose from, making a decision can be overwhelming. Don't fret – we've got you covered!

Introducing our Sample Size Beard Beard Balm Kit, designed to let you experience the full range of our unique scents. Dive into all 6 fragrances with generous 15ml bottles and find your beard's perfect match.

settings.title: CHOICE OF 6 GREAT SCENTS
settings.text:
Beard Balm Sample Kit: Your Personal Scent Journey

Embark on an olfactory adventure with our Beard Oil Sample Kit. Pictured here are six meticulously crafted scents, each bottled in our signature gothic design. From the robust intensity of 'Billion' to the refined subtlety of 'Tobacco & Vanilla', there's a fragrance to suit every gentleman's preference.

  • Billion: A scent that commands attention, encapsulating power and prestige.
  • Invictors: Embodies the spirit of the undefeated, a testament to strength and perseverance.
  • Kreed: For the man of honor, reflecting loyalty and integrity.
  • Rebel Gentleman: A fragrance for the maverick, blending tradition with rebellion.
  • Savage: Raw and unapologetic, capturing the essence of wild freedom.
  • Tobacco & Vanilla: A timeless blend, exuding warmth and sophistication.

    See full scent list above

settings.title: LUXURY BEARD AND BONES GIFT SET BOX
settings.text: Experience the epitome of gothic elegance with our Luxury Beard and Bones Gift Set Box. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this box is a testament to both form and function. Its sleek black design, adorned with intricate patterns and our distinctive logo, exudes an air of sophistication. The magnetic closure ensures your beard Balms remain secure, while offering effortless access. Inside, the foam inlay cradles each 15ml Jars, ensuring they stay in pristine condition. The box is not just a container; it's an experience. Whether you're treating yourself or gifting a loved one, this luxury set promises a touch of opulence with every use
